Once Motorola link is installed, connect your phone to your home computer with a USB cable to start syncing music to it. \n\n
Get started now by connecting your phone to your home computer with a USB cable.
Once you are connected, Motorola Media Link software will automatically download and install on the computer.
Personalizes and expands your music experience.
Yes, I want to receive Live Music \n information

Get fresh music news, concert events, and song recommendations based on the artists you play. 
 
See and preview the music your friends are playing, and share the music you love by posting to social networks. 

Indulge your music passions with artist photos, biographies, discographies, music videos and more. 

Get access to your MP3 library, internet radio stations and podcasts all from one convenient location. 

Discover new artists and shop for your favorite songs from a vast music catalog.

It appears that either you do not have a MOTOBLUR account or you are not currently logged into the MOTOBLUR service on this device. 

A MOTOBLUR account is required to access some features of this application such as podcasts and internet radio. 

To add an account, touch "Setup MOTOBLUR Account" 

If you choose not to sign up now, you can do so at a later date from the Accounts screen under Settings from the main menu or home screen.

You can sync music to your mobile device and start listening right away without sharing any information. If you want to get Live Music information like song recommendations, news, and artist biographies you need to agree to share your music activity. 

If you agree to share, Motorola will collect information about the music on your library, your play history, and your listening preferences. We will only use this informaiton to deliver Live Music Information and we will keep it private. You can always change your Live Music Settings later by going to the settings option in the menu.

You may have reached this screen in error. You are currently missing consent to share your music activity with Music. 

 Giving consent enables Music to deliver the best music experience to you.

 If you choose not to give consent now you can always return to the setup screen from the options menu from music home.
You can transfer music to your mobile device by syncing with your favorite music application like iTunes or Windows Media Player.
Get started now by downloading the software to your computer from:
Sync your music library with Motorola Media link
Music Tutorial Video Not Available, Please try again later
Media Share Application Not Available, Please try again later

Parts of this application including Internet Radio, Podcasts, and image downloads can consume large amounts of network data. With data saver enabled all of the features will function, but this application will reduce the amount of network data consumed by disabling the download of album art, artist photos, and other images. You can turn off data saver by tapping Settings below.
Data saver mode is enabled and wifi is not connected

Control and play MP3\'s, podcasts, internet and FM radio
Touch here to go to music dashboard
See songs you have recently added
See recommended songs, news, events and the latest music updates from friends
Retrieves album & artist art, news, events, song recommendations & more.
Manages what info is downloaded and shared with Music.
Send data privately about your music taste with Music to improve accuracy of song recommendations and Mix This Playlists.
Recommendation of songs, music videos, music events and internet radio stations that fit your music taste.
View your friend\'s activities from music services that you are a member of.
Get news on artists from your music library and on songs that you are currently playing.
Scrobble the songs that you play to your last.fm profile.
Downloads the 5 most recent episodes for each subscribed podcast.
Sets the FM tuner to your region.

\nBefore continuing you must first register this application with AT&T.\n
Once registered you will receive an SMS with an activation code that you enter in the next screen.
Purchases cannot be completed until you have registered your device with AT&T
\nPlease wait while the SMS message with the activation code is sent to your device.\n
Once you have received the code, please enter the information above and then select Submit.
In order to activate your application you must first enter an activation code.
One or more values in the activation code was incorrectly inputed. Please try again.
An activation code has already been sent to you via SMS. Do you want to receive another activation code?
